mapper.select: SELECT r.seq, r.reviewTitle, r.reviewContent, r.rating, r.mealKit_seq, r.userUi_seq, u.name AS userName, r.regDate, r.modDate FROM review r JOIN userUi u ON r.userUi_seq = u.seq WHERE r.mealKit_seq = #{mealKitSeq} ORDER BY r.regDate DESC
SELECT seq, reviewTitle, reviewContent, rating, mealKit_seq, userUi_seq, regDate, modDate FROM review WHERE seq = #{seq}
